name: WitchBoard III
description:
WitchBoard, WitchBoard, Spirits of the Board– WAIT! It’s still just an App right?

Just concentrate on a question, touch the planchette, and watch the response the WitchBoard reveals. Each positive response lights a candle on The Circle and summons a Board Guardian.  A negative response dies one out. 

But beware… lighting the fifth candle completes The Circle and releases a spirit of the board!

Tap the Moon for Settings

Tap the Sun for Version info

WitchBoard III Now available for Win and Mac Desktops

Mobile versions (IOS, Android, and Kindle Fire) available at The AppStore, Google Play, and Amazon.
